website_summaries.verdict: Efficient waste cleanup with detailed engineering that minimizes mess and maximizes cleanup.
pros: We love that it comes with a clear lid so you can see how full the container is
Features a built-in port to remove needles
Great for at-home disposal of needles and medications
cons: Different color options would be ideal for home use

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but I don't see why the VA, doesn't give these to veterans. I have to purchase them myself. Also their should be a way to ship these to the disposal facility.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W.

customer_reviews.title: Please retract my negative review
customer_reviews.text: this is totally my fault. I previously wrote a negative review thinking that I only received one 1 gallon bin. It turns out the second bin was stacked inside the first and I never noticed. I apologize. The bins are perfect, exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: dannyc71

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Dexcom G6 CGM sharps!
customer_reviews.text: This size is great for my insulin pump and CGM sharps. Especially since the Dexcom G6 applicators are so large. It's not so large as to be obnoxious, it's about the same size as the small trash can in my bathroom so I just have it right next to that.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M.

customer_reviews.title: BioHazard Sharps Containers
customer_reviews.text: We received 2 containers for my husband's used insulin syringes. They are sturdy and easy to use. The size is just what he needed for the disposable hard plastic cases that contain the insulin, syringe and needle. They are disposed as the whole unit mentioned as mentioned above. Perfect! Thank you!.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Lux

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for price.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is diabetic & uses 2 types of insulin. The other type of needle boxes we had gotten before were very hard to get multiple disposable needle pens into. Flap in top would get stuck open. New box opens easier & closes with our much effort. Will definitely order more as we need to do so. This style holds more pens. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Diabetic need
customer_reviews.text: The sharps containers available in my area were too small for some of my needles. I was glad to be able to get something big enough to use. They should last a long time as the needles are only used once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and a nice large opening
customer_reviews.text: They are nice and large, so they will take a lot of syringes before it is full. The opening is very nice and large, which is a nice touch, easy to pop my insulin syringes into it. Will surely buy again. Delivery was quick also.
customer_reviews.author: LifesavrTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Size
customer_reviews.text: We have used other Oakridge products in the past. This and other products they have supplied were of excellent quality. This particular product is a more convenient size for easy storage and disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Campello

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and convenient size
customer_reviews.text: For adult households, I like these sharps containers. It is super easy to drop the sharp through an opening in the flat top - no struggling with a little door. The opening stays open until the container is filled so the sharps could be accessed by children or spilled if it tipped over. But we like the size and shape too -more stable, takes up less room on a counter and when full, easier to seal up and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie J.

customer_reviews.title: Easily Holds Used Injection Pens
customer_reviews.text: I had a stack of old injection pens to get rid of, and these containers are perfect! Easily holds months' (years?) worth of pens and other non-household trash medical paraphernalia. Waste is secure and easily identified. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Liane

customer_reviews.title: The Best I Found
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size, even the opening. When you are on an insulin pump, a CGM and plus at least two more injections pens a week. Not filling up fast and easy to drop the used devices in it without missing.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl D.

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: These sharp containers are great size for person having diabetes & has multiple finger sticks & insulin daily.
customer_reviews.author: Runner1

customer_reviews.title: Holds about 6mo maybe more Trulicity
customer_reviews.text: No complaint, second purchase. Weekly Trulicity goes in it.. now to find a place to dump other 2!
customer_reviews.author: Tmeb

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, large capacity, very secure lid
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to collect and dispose of sharps for my grandparents. At three shots per day for each of them, the prior bins that we were using fill up pretty quick. These will definitely take longer to fill up and therefore are a particularly good value at about $10 per container.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Capacity
customer_reviews.text: I like the capacity, sturdiness and the opening, which I do not close since I do not have children.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Product was affordable. Very large and can accommodate bulky insulin pens. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: maureen perez

customer_reviews.title: price is right
customer_reviews.text: These containers are a good size and suit the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Gyrom

customer_reviews.title: Large Bio Hazard containers
customer_reviews.text: Good containers for Bio Waste, but doesn't come with returnable box.
customer_reviews.author: Beesforme

customer_reviews.title: A great and safe product. Also environmental protective.
customer_reviews.text: Have use this product before. It surpassed my expectations by far. I am now using the second container of my first order that I received in November. This order is my second one so that I may the containers in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expected
customer_reviews.text: We had smaller ones but they filled up too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely be ordering more
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. It is perfect for diabetic pump cannula needles which are much larger than typical syringes. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Best help with medical needs waste items.
customer_reviews.text: I have diabetes and with the medicines I have to take, I use this for my testing supplies and my shot meds. It work out one container will last me six months. So this is a great deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: W. G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great! Love being able to get these delivered and Less money then buying through my vet
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Use the best. Do not take chances on quality.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp disposable containers are the only product I use to dispose of my syringes and other bio hazard materials.
customer_reviews.author: Royal D. Whetstone Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I use single use, pre-filled devices. Many disposal containers are too small. I liked the large size.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Petters Allington

customer_reviews.title: Large opening
customer_reviews.text: The large opening makes it easy to drop in pen needles without taking off the plastic cap.
customer_reviews.author: LibraryLady

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: These containers are a good size. Had a bunch of my mom’s accumulated syringes and our county will not accept them if not in these containers. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Great for families with multiple sharps users!
customer_reviews.text: Like the overall size. Opening at the top could be a little bit bigger, but not really a problem. This is really handy for us, as there are three of us all on injectable meds at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Jovet

customer_reviews.title: I'm 😀 Happy!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing that I have to complain about. Your driver delivered the things that I ordered 44 minutes before I thought they were going to be here. I am happy with my orders. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. This product was even cheaper and larger than the containers sold by our medical waste service company. Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: GSJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Nice size buckets for a person with diabetes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As I expected it to be. And packed very well with instructions to were to send it.
customer_reviews.author: Archie Keeton Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Affordability and properly sized.
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for daily injections. Not overly priced. Found a place to take the used syringes. I am all set!
customer_reviews.author: Nanaymie K. Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what was needed for my son’s Diabetic Home Sharps Station....
customer_reviews.author: Matosj317

customer_reviews.title: I’ll buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, the opening on the top makes life a lot easier. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MrFantaztiq

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what a need. Large enough to last for two years. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Hamula

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Easy to close. Good for those insulin injection tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its safe from children
customer_reviews.text: what i like about this product is thati ise it for my insulin syringes and pen needles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Help when you need it most...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the little round door, not the little flip back and forth. It fits in my cupboard and is out of the way Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Donna Grice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for small business use. Definitely will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything was good
customer_reviews.text: Rebuking this product . Good experience everything arrived when they said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Ybarra

customer_reviews.title: Love it. 😍
customer_reviews.text: Love the wide mouth. I don’t dislike anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: brenda lemoine

customer_reviews.title: Closure  Not Secure
customer_reviews.text: The size was fine, but the closure was flimsy and not secure.
customer_reviews.author: Marelia E. Ash

customer_reviews.title: Good size.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and big. Not for travel, but will last 3-4 months if using just for personal pen needles
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I ordered, delivered in the promised two days. I use it for discarding used Enbrel syringes.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Ketchadog2@embarqmail.com
customer_reviews.text: Was received in timely manner, and used as intended. Thank you, respectfully. Mr. Dexter Richardson, 5-stars service.
customer_reviews.author: DEXTER RICHARDSON

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's just the right size to fit it county disposal bins.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cupp

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: These containers are of good sturdy and will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product comes with good information will buy more if I need them
customer_reviews.author: Angel Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Sharps containers
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived within just a few days. Product is just as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Morehouse

customer_reviews.title: they hold a lot of needles.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of them but I don't like that they open so big.
customer_reviews.author: Jean bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, opening is a good size, 2 gallon is a plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: TGarza

customer_reviews.title: Syringe
customer_reviews.text: My dad is diabetic we have give him insulin we use this for to discard Syringe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping product exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our Acupuncture clinic. Nice sized opening, they fit perfectly in wall cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: chuan liu mamc

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Too small for the shop: I ordered the incorrect size.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta A. Santa Croce

customer_reviews.title: Better capacity for pens!
customer_reviews.text: The previous container I purchased promised a large capabicity for pens, but I could only fit 3 in it. This one is sturdy, and won't fill up for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, safe and secure!
customer_reviews.text: This was for a friend who is a licensed acupuncturist. She was using the small disposal containers, but business has picked up and they needed the 2 gallon. Easy to use and safe and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Adam LaFarelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my mom, they large enough for her pen needles, she using insulin, so she was paying out pocket for her sharp container that very small. These are perfect enough for her, and reasonably priced. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size container for my dogs insulin needles.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my dogs insulin needles. My vet requires me to use something like this to dispose of her needles. Once it’s full I can just take the container up to the vet and they will properly dispose of this container for me.
customer_reviews.author: Grayfox

customer_reviews.title: Can’t dispose of properly.
customer_reviews.text: Works well but hard to dispose of. There are no local areas that take the gallon size for drop off. If there was a place they could be shipped to that would be helpful information to include.
customer_reviews.author: Labboro

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to use and dependable. Very happy I got this. Would certainly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila English

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use. No more monthly need for a container. CONVENIENCE!
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes. Very helpful for my 90 yr old diabetic grandmother. Will get her through needs for at least six months per container.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, just what I had expected. This item shipped quickly and was packaged excellently.
customer_reviews.author: riveted reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Price . . . Good Size . . .
customer_reviews.text: This is a must when you use syringes for medication. These are the perfect size to hold a good quantity of my insulin syringes.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Little

customer_reviews.title: Quick service, product as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Quick service, product as advertised. These look just like the ones in the doctor's office.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Janusko

customer_reviews.title: Big size, big savings.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. A big enough size to last me a while.
customer_reviews.author: Tonna

customer_reviews.title: Great seller and great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of these containers because they hold so much. High quality.

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, but will probably get a bigger size next time.

customer_reviews.title: Sharps Container
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my humira pens and they work perfect for it.

customer_reviews.title: Opening large enough for injector pens
customer_reviews.text: I chose this because the large opening allows me to dispose of injector pens.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality and ease of use of this product.

product_meta.title: 2 Gallon Size | Sharps and Biohazard Waste Disposal Container (Pack of 2) by Oakridge Products
feature_bullets: EASY ACCESS - the large rotating opening (5.5") allows for easy one handed opening and closing
CLEAR LID - allows a view of the fill level, temporary closure for safety, and snap locks for final disposal
SAFE DISPOSAL - needles, syringes, pen needles, lancets, blades (razors, scalpels, etc.) pipettes, glass slides
PUNCTURE RESISTANT material. Safe to autoclave or incinerate. Meets or exceeds cdc Standards including OSHA and EPA requirements for local biohazard waste collection
OSHA APPROVED- exact same product we sell to hospitals nationwide
